title: Awkward Tongue
data:
{| cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" border="1" |- style="font-style:italic;" |Rank||Effect||Flavor |- |1||Scrolls take 50% longer to read. ||Your tongue gives you trouble enunciating. |- | colspan="3" | Scrolls are read instantly and have an effect instantly.
The delay ''after'' reading a scroll is increased by 50% (as if you were [[slow]]ed). |- | colspan="3" | '''Species Notes:''' Exclusive to [[Armataur]]. |- style="font-style:italic;" | colspan="3" | [[Bad mutations|Bad mutation]] |} [[Category:Mutations]] [[Category:Bad Mutations]]
